sentence_base: The restaurant opens at noon.
sentence_b: Breakfast ends at 9:00 p.m.

sentence_base: He fixed the bug in the payment form.

sentence_base: Her flight lands tomorrow morning.
sentence_a: She arrives early the next day.
sentence_b: She booked a cruise for July.

sentence_base: Please recycle plastic bottles.
sentence_a: Put plastic containers in the blue bin.
sentence_b: Glass is heavier than wood.

sentence_base: The guitar was out of tune.
sentence_b: The piano teacher canceled class.

sentence_base: We need a vegetarian option.

sentence_b: We finished a week early.

sentence_base: The toddler fell asleep in the car seat.
sentence_a: The child napped during the drive.
sentence_b: The cat scratched the sofa.

sentence_base: They hiked to the peak at sunrise.
sentence_a: They reached the summit early in the morning.

sentence_b: The UI uses a serif font.

sentence_base: Coffee prices rose sharply this year.

sentence_base: He runs five kilometers every morning.
sentence_b: He paints landscapes on weekends.

sentence_base: Keep the seedlings in partial shade.
sentence_a: Place young plants where they get filtered light.
sentence_b: Water freezes at 0°C.

sentence_base: Set the oven to 375°F.

sentence_base: Water the cactus sparingly in winter.
